EFI_IP_ADDRESS Union Reference


Data Fields

UINT32 Addr [4]
EFI_IPv4_ADDRESS v4
EFI_IPv6_ADDRESS v6

Detailed Description

16-byte buffer aligned on a 4-byte boundary. An IPv4 or IPv6 internet protocol address.
